title: The Electra One Preset File Format version 2

version.title: The preset version
version.description: version of the Electra One Preset file format.

name.title: The preset name
name.description: human readable name as it will be shown to the user.

projectId.title: The project identifier
projectId.description: used by the Electra Editor to identify particular preset. The preset file without the project identifier cannot be read by the Electra One Editor application.

pages.title: The pages
pages.description: a page is a collection of controls shown to the user. One page is shown at time. One preset may have multiple pages and users may navigate between them.

id.title: The page identifier
id.description: an identifier of the page. The identifier is used for referring particular page from other objects, such as controls and groups.

name.title: The page name
name.description: name of the page as it will be shown to the user. The page name should preferably reflect contents of the page.

groups.title: The groups
groups.description: graphical elements to organize controls to logical groups.

pageId.title: The page identifier
pageId.description: an identifier of the page where given group belongs to. The pageId must point to an existing page identifier defined in the pages array.

bounds.title: The bounds
bounds.description: position and dimensions of the group. [ x, y, width, height].

name.title: The group name
name.description: name of the group as it will show on the display.

color.title: The color
color.description: the color of the group's graphics. The colors are defined as RGB565 hex values.

devices.title: The devices
devices.description: list of MIDI devices used within a preset. A device represents a particular MIDI device connected to given MIDI port and channel.

anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema
anyOf.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

id.title: The device identifier
id.description: a unique identifier of the device. Used as a reference to the device elsewhere in the preset file.

name.title: The device name
name.description: name of a particular MIDI device.

instrumentId.title: The instrument identifier
instrumentId.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.
